title: McLaren backs F1 champions display at 2025 Silverstone Festival
summary: McLaren will play a major role in this summer’s Silverstone Festival as it backs a landmark exhibition celebrating the 75th anniversary of the Formula 1 world championship. The Woking-based team…

qa_pairs.question: What milestone anniversary will be celebrated at the 2025 Silverstone Festival?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: 75th anniversary of the Formula 1 world championship
wrong_options: 50th anniversary of the Formula 1 world championship

qa_pairs.question: Which F1 team is backing the exhibition at the 2025 Silverstone Festival?
In what year will the Silverstone Festival celebrating the 75th anniversary of F1 take place?
